Module lanej.schedulingsystem
Package lanej.schedulingsystem.dao

Class CountryDAO

java.lang.Object
lanej.schedulingsystem.dao.CountryDAO
public abstract class CountryDAO extends Object
Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing Country entities.

This class provides an abstraction over the database operations related to the Country class. It primarily contains a method for fetching all countries from the database.

The list of countries is expected to remain constant during the application's runtime, so the getAllCountries() method uses caching to minimize redundant database queries.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Malcolm Wabara, Jonathan Lane

  • Method Details

    • getAllCountries

      public static List<Country> getAllCountries()
      Retrieves all countries from the database.

      If the countries have been previously fetched and cached, the cached list is returned to minimize unnecessary database access.

      Returns:
      A list of all Country entities from the database.
